teech.sdk
Class Query

java.lang.Object
  teech.sdk.TeechModel
      teech.sdk.Query

public class Query
extends TeechModel

Teech.io REST API let you retrieve items in a very flexible way. Sending a GET request to the class URL, simply lists all items.

search

public JSONArray search(java.lang.String endpoint,
                        java.lang.String key,

                 throws teech.sdk.exceptions.InvalidRequestException,
                        teech.sdk.exceptions.TeechAuthenticationException,
                        teech.sdk.exceptions.APIConnectionException,
                        teech.sdk.exceptions.TeechException,
                        java.lang.Exception
Return a JSONArray that contain a result of you query. If the query is unsuccessfully, this JSONArray is null.

Parameters:
endpoint - the name of the endpoint on which perform the research
key - the key of the object
value - the value of the object
Returns:
JSONArray
